title: 如何检测玩家指定物品的名字
author: Danger_S.M
txt_content: testfor @p[team=tu] {Inventory:[{id:minecraft:wooden_shovel,Damage:0s,Count:1b}]}如何在这个指令中检测指定名字的木铲？

replies.author: End-Enderman
replies.txt_content: 试试这个testfor @p[team=tu] {Inventory:[{id:minecraft:wooden_shovel,Damage:0s,Count:1b,tag:{display:{Name:"xxx"}}}]}复制代码xxx还是老样子，填写铲子名称

replies.author: lzs1234
replies.txt_content:
testfor @p[team=tu] {Inventory:[{id:minecraft:wooden_shovel,Damage:0s,Count:1b,tag:{CustomName:XXXX}}}]}
Name这个标签不是探测名字的吧@End-Enderman

replies.author: Danger_S.M
replies.txt_content:
lzs1234 发表于 2015-7-14 17:35
testfor @p[team=tu] {Inventory:[{id:minecraft:wooden_shovel,Damage:0s,Count:1b,tag:{CustomName:XXXX} ...
然而测试成功

replies.author: 爱心魔王FHC
replies.txt_content:
lzs1234 发表于 2015-7-14 17:35
testfor @p[team=tu] {Inventory:[{id:minecraft:wooden_shovel,Damage:0s,Count:1b,tag:{CustomName:XXXX} ...
物品名是Name，那个是实体名
